on.name: Turn on npc mystifier.
on.hint: Turn on npc mystifier, renaming tokens based on their traits if Alt (configurable) is clicked when adding to scene.

npcMystifierMethod.name: How to generate mystified npc names.
npcMystifierMethod.hint: Currently Mystifying by using the NPCs traits is the only supported option.

npcMystifierFilterRaritiesReplacement.name: Word to replace rarities greater than Common with.
npcMystifierFilterRaritiesReplacement.hint: Set the word to replace rarities greater than Common with. If empty, do not change the displayed rarity.

npcMystifierAddRandomNumber.name: Add random number to name.
npcMystifierAddRandomNumber.hint: Turns on adding a random number when mystifying npcs.

npcMystifierFilterEliteWeak.name: No npc elite/weak status in name.
npcMystifierFilterEliteWeak.hint: Filter out elite/weak from the mystified name.

npcMystifierFilterCreatureTypesTraits.name: No npc creature type traits in name.
npcMystifierFilterCreatureTypesTraits.hint: Filter out creature type traits (see https://2e.aonprd.com/Traits.aspx) from the mystified name.

npcMystifierFilterCreatureFamilyTraits.name: No npc creature family traits in name.
npcMystifierFilterCreatureFamilyTraits.hint: Filter out creature family traits (see https://2e.aonprd.com/MonsterFamilies.aspx?Type=M) from the mystified name.

npcMystifierFilterOthers.name: No npc traits not in the above trait types.
npcMystifierFilterOthers.hint: Filter out npc traits not in the above trait types (see the links in the above setting options) from the mystified name.

npcMystifierFilterRarities.name: No npc rarity in the name.
npcMystifierFilterRarities.hint: Filter out rarities from the mystified name.

npcMystifierKey.name: Key to mystify
npcMystifierKey.hint: Hold this to mystify npc as it's dragged out to the scene. Note that if you choose Alt (the default) it also hides the npc.

npcMystifierPrefix.name: Word to prefix new name with
npcMystifierPrefix.hint: What to prefix new name with (default 'Unknown').

npcMystifierPostfix.name: Word to postfix new name with
npcMystifierPostfix.hint: What to postfix new name with, defaults to '' (example: 'Creature').
